name: Bench Press
description: A chest exercise where you press a barbell upwards while lying on a bench.

name: Inclined Bench Press
description: A variation of the bench press performed on an inclined bench to target the upper chest.

name: Declined Bench Press
description: A variation of the bench press performed on a declined bench to target the lower chest.

name: Overhead Shoulder Press
description: A shoulder exercise where you press a weight overhead while standing or seated.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body exercise that involves lifting a barbell from the ground to a standing position.

name: Pec Fly Machine
description: A machine exercise that isolates the chest muscles by mimicking the motion of a fly.

name: Leg Extension Machine
description: A machine exercise that targets the quadriceps by extending the legs from a seated position.

name: Squat
description: A lower body exercise where you bend your knees and hips to lower your body, then stand back up.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: A lower body exercise where you bend your knees and hips to lower your body, with a barbell placed across your upper back, then stand back up.

name: Leg Press Machine
description: A machine exercise where you push a weight away from you using your legs.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine exercise that targets the upper back by pulling a bar down towards your chest.

name: Pull-Up
description: An upper body exercise where you lift your body up to a bar using your back and arm muscles.

name: Seated Row
description: A machine exercise that targets the back muscles by pulling a handle towards your torso while seated.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An arm exercise that targets the biceps by lifting a weight towards your shoulder.

name: Tricep Overhead Extension
description: An arm exercise that targets the triceps by extending the arm at the elbow.

name: Leg Curl Machine
description: A machine exercise that targets the hamstrings by curling the legs towards the buttocks.

name: Lateral Raise
description: A shoulder exercise where you lift weights out to the side of your body.

name: Front Raise
description: A shoulder exercise where you lift weights to the front of your body.

name: Calf Raise
description: A lower body exercise that targets the calf muscles by raising the heels off the ground.

name: Hammer Curl
description: An arm exercise similar to the bicep curl, but with a neutral grip.

name: Preacher Curl
description: A bicep curl variation performed on a preacher bench to isolate the biceps.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
description: An arm exercise that targets the triceps by pushing a cable attachment downwards.

name: Chest Press Machine
description: A machine exercise that mimics the bench press.

name: Smith Machine Squat
description: A squat variation performed on a Smith machine for added stability.

name: T-Bar Row
description: A back exercise where you pull a T-bar towards your torso.

name: Bent Over Row
description: A back exercise where you bend at the waist and pull a weight towards your torso.

name: Upright Row
description: A shoulder exercise where you pull a weight upwards along the front of your body.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: A chest exercise where you lower and lift dumbbells out to the sides while lying on a bench.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: A chest exercise similar to the incline bench press but using dumbbells.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
description: A shoulder exercise performed on a machine that mimics the overhead press.

name: Reverse Pec Deck Fly
description: A machine exercise that targets the rear delts by mimicking the motion of a reverse fly.

name: Cable Crossover
description: A chest exercise that targets the inner chest by pulling cables across the body.

name: Seated Calf Raise
description: A calf exercise performed while seated, targeting the soleus muscle.

name: Standing Calf Raise
description: A calf exercise performed while standing, targeting the gastrocnemius muscle.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation that targets the hamstrings and glutes.

name: Glute Bridge
description: A lower body exercise that targets the glutes by lifting the hips off the ground while lying on your back.

name: Hip Thrust
description: A lower body exercise that targets the glutes by lifting the hips off the ground with the shoulders supported on a bench.

name: Cable Bicep Curl
description: An arm exercise that targets the biceps by curling a cable attachment.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: A shoulder exercise where you press dumbbells overhead.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
description: A bench press variation performed on a Smith machine for added stability.

name: Hack Squat
description: A squat variation performed on a hack squat machine to target the quadriceps.

name: Reverse Lunge
description: A lower body exercise where you step backward into a lunge.

name: Step-Up
description: A lower body exercise where you step onto a raised platform.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: A full-body exercise that involves swinging a kettlebell between the legs and up to shoulder height.

name: Goblet Squat
description: A squat variation performed while holding a weight in front of the chest.

name: Sumo Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation with a wide stance that targets the inner thighs and glutes.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
description: A machine exercise that targets the outer thighs by spreading the legs apart.

name: Hip Adduction Machine
description: A machine exercise that targets the inner thighs by bringing the legs together.

name: Cable Face Pull
description: A shoulder exercise that targets the rear delts by pulling a cable attachment towards the face.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
description: A chest exercise performed on an incline bench that targets the upper chest.

name: Dips
description: A chest and triceps exercise where you lower and lift your body using parallel bars.

name: Push-Up
description: A chest, shoulders, and triceps exercise where you push your body up from the ground.

name: Plank
description: A core exercise where you hold a push-up position for a set amount of time.

name: Russian Twist
description: An oblique exercise where you twist your torso side to side while holding a weight.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description: An abdominal exercise where you raise your legs while hanging from a bar.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A full-body exercise where you perform a running motion while in a plank position.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise that involves a squat, jump, and push-up.

name: Box Jump
description: A lower body plyometric exercise where you jump onto a raised platform.

name: Turkish Get-Up
description: A full-body exercise that involves transitioning from lying down to standing up while holding a weight overhead.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: An exercise where you walk while holding heavy weights in each hand.

name: Snatch
description: An Olympic lift where you lift a barbell from the ground to overhead in one motion.

name: Clean and Jerk
description: An Olympic lift where you lift a barbell from the ground to the shoulders and then overhead.

name: Battle Ropes
description: An exercise where you create waves with heavy ropes to build strength and endurance.

name: Crunch Machine
description: A machine exercise that targets the abdominal muscles by mimicking the motion of a crunch.

name: Chest Supported Row Machine
description: A back exercise performed on a machine where you row with your chest supported on a pad, targeting the upper and middle back muscles.

name: Barbell Row
description: A back exercise where you pull a barbell towards your torso while bent over.

name: Skull Crusher
description: A tricep exercise where you lower a barbell towards your forehead and extend back up.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: A lower body exercise where you perform a split squat with your rear foot elevated on a bench.

name: Pallof Press
description: A core exercise that involves pressing a cable or resistance band away from the body to resist rotation.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
description: An abdominal exercise where you raise your knees towards your chest while hanging from a bar.

name: Landmine Press
description: A shoulder exercise where you press a barbell anchored at one end in a landmine attachment.

name: Landmine Row
description: A back exercise where you pull a barbell anchored at one end in a landmine attachment towards your torso.

name: Donkey Calf Raise
description: A calf exercise where you raise your heels while bent over with weight on your lower back.

name: Jump Rope
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves jumping over a rope as it passes under your feet and over your head.

name: Running
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves jogging or sprinting over a distance.

name: Cycling
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves riding a bicycle, either stationary or moving.

name: Rowing Machine
description: A cardiovascular exercise that mimics the action of rowing a boat, using a machine.

name: Elliptical Trainer
description: A cardiovascular exercise performed on a machine that mimics walking or running without causing excessive pressure on the joints.

name: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT)
description: A form of cardiovascular exercise that alternates short periods of intense anaerobic exercise with less intense recovery periods.

name: Stair Climber
description: A cardiovascular exercise performed on a machine that mimics the motion of climbing stairs.

name: Aerobics
description: A form of cardiovascular exercise that includes rhythmic activities, often performed to music.

name: Dance Cardio
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves various dance movements and routines to elevate heart rate.

name: Shadow Boxing
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves throwing punches in the air to increase heart rate and improve cardiovascular fitness.

name: Narrow Grip Lat Pulldown
description: A lat pulldown variation where you use a narrow grip to target the inner back muscles.

name: Supinated Lat Pulldown
description: A lat pulldown variation where you use a supinated grip to target the biceps and upper back.

name: Cable Pullover
description: A back exercise where you pull a cable bar from above your head down towards your hips, focusing on the lats.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: A versatile exercise that targets the chest and lats by lowering and raising a dumbbell over your head while lying on a bench.

name: Reverse Grip Bench Press
description: A bench press variation where you use a reverse grip to emphasize the upper chest and triceps.

name: Cable Chest Press
description: A chest exercise where you press a cable attachment forward, similar to a bench press, but with constant tension.

name: Cable Front Raise
description: A shoulder exercise where you lift a cable attachment to the front, targeting the anterior deltoids.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
description: A shoulder exercise where you lift a cable attachment to the side, targeting the lateral deltoids.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
description: A back exercise where you row a dumbbell towards your torso while bent over, focusing on each side individually.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
description: A shoulder exercise that targets the trapezius by shrugging the shoulders while holding dumbbells.

name: Lying Leg Curl
description: A machine exercise that targets the hamstrings by curling the legs towards the buttocks while lying face down.

name: Good Morning
description: A lower body exercise where you hinge at the hips to lower your torso, targeting the hamstrings and glutes.

name: Zercher Squat
description: A squat variation where you hold the barbell in the crook of your elbows, emphasizing the quads and core.

name: Sissy Squat
description: A quad-focused squat variation performed with a sissy squat bench or by leaning back on the balls of your feet.

name: Jefferson Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation where you straddle the barbell, focusing on the quads, glutes, and core.

name: Cossack Squat
description: A lower body exercise where you perform a deep side lunge, targeting the inner thighs and glutes.

name: Dragon Flag
description: An advanced core exercise where you lower and raise your body in a straight line while lying on a bench.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: A core exercise where you hold a hollow position, with your lower back pressed to the floor and your arms and legs extended.

name: Reverse Crunch
description: An abdominal exercise where you curl your hips towards your chest, focusing on the lower abs.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
description: A core exercise that involves rolling an ab wheel away from your body while maintaining a stable core.

name: Pike Push-Up
description: A shoulder exercise where you perform a push-up in a pike position, emphasizing the shoulders.

name: Cable Crunch
description: An abdominal exercise where you perform a crunch motion with a cable attachment for added resistance.
